abstracts.cdata!:
The Technical Assistance Project
            comprises a five year program of technical assistance to the
            Federal Ministry of Finance, the Federal Ministry of
            National Planning and the Federal Office of Statistics.
            Consultant services and data processing equipment will be
            furnished to strengthen the management information system
            upon which economic decision-making is based. The monitoring
            of external debt and of national plan implementation will be
            strengthened. The linkage between the national development
            plan and the budget will be improved and programs for the
            training of planners will be developed.
